# Bienvenidos a nuestra pagina

En este mostraremos toda la documentacion , pasos de como realizar una recopilacion de datos de diferentes redes sociales con sus respectivas tecnicas junto al almacenamiento en sistemas gestores de bases de datos que administran datos no Sql y Sql.

## Recoleccion de datos de Platzi

Se realizo la recoleccion de datos de platzi la cual es una plataforma de educación online efectiva, la cual ofrece mas de 700 cursos enfocados ingeniería y desarrollo de software, diseño y UX, ingles, marketing digital, emprendimiento y negocios y mucho mas.

### Recoleccion de datos de Twitter

#### Twitter a CouchDb

Para la recoleccion de datos de Twitter a CouchDb se lo realizo en jupyter notebook mediante script , por ello lo mas revelevante de tomar en consideracion es :

Importar las librerias necesarias, que en este caso fueron 3, couchdb,tweepy y json.

![This is an image](https://southcentralus1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fepnecuador-my.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!YP5u9sklC0iywPgRepMQVOdg8BAkAQlLoHr_GSobHaPNJuBAAf_VQKAw4x81bXaz%2Fitems%2F01PVDBQA25YB2MHGJD5RDL3U3PXNXEBIDL%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..OFpoM24ycHBOMHdtcnlLUTBabEdhbDBJVWEyRFdydUpyUE5JU2tsNHlSbz0&cTag=%22c%3A%7BC374C05D-2399-46EC-BDD3-6FBB6E40A06B%7D%2C1%22&encodeFailures=1&width=1366&height=581&srcWidth=&srcHeight=)

Tener las API es decir las claves.

![This is an image](https://southcentralus1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fepnecuador-my.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!YP5u9sklC0iywPgRepMQVOdg8BAkAQlLoHr_GSobHaPNJuBAAf_VQKAw4x81bXaz%2Fitems%2F01PVDBQAY3OV55YV3N6ZBJ6NHHD7JUXMRY%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..OFpoM24ycHBOMHdtcnlLUTBabEdhbDBJVWEyRFdydUpyUE5JU2tsNHlSbz0&cTag=%22c%3A%7BDC7B751B-6D57-42F6-9F34-E71FD34BB238%7D%2C1%22&encodeFailures=1&width=1366&height=581&srcWidth=&srcHeight=)

Realizar bien la clase para la extraccion de datos .

![This is an image](https://southcentralus1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fepnecuador-my.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!YP5u9sklC0iywPgRepMQVOdg8BAkAQlLoHr_GSobHaPNJuBAAf_VQKAw4x81bXaz%2Fitems%2F01PVDBQA6IAPZ4GL3OIJCLEB55WNJ5SW7S%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..OFpoM24ycHBOMHdtcnlLUTBabEdhbDBJVWEyRFdydUpyUE5JU2tsNHlSbz0&cTag=%22c%3A%7BC3F303C8-6E2F-4442-B207-BDB353D95BF2%7D%2C2%22&encodeFailures=1&width=1366&height=581&srcWidth=&srcHeight=)


Pasamos como parametro las claves para poder tener acceso.

![This is an image](https://southcentralus1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fepnecuador-my.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!YP5u9sklC0iywPgRepMQVOdg8BAkAQlLoHr_GSobHaPNJuBAAf_VQKAw4x81bXaz%2Fitems%2F01PVDBQA7WN7FL4EXEX5DYVTRPXVENY6LQ%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..OFpoM24ycHBOMHdtcnlLUTBabEdhbDBJVWEyRFdydUpyUE5JU2tsNHlSbz0&cTag=%22c%3A%7BBECA6FF6-E412-47BF-8ACE-2FBD48DC7970%7D%2C1%22&encodeFailures=1&width=1366&height=581&srcWidth=&srcHeight=)

Verificar que se realizo la conexion localmente con las bases de datos,colocar correctamente el nombre de usuario y contraseña que tengamos.

![This is an image](https://southcentralus1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fepnecuador-my.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!YP5u9sklC0iywPgRepMQVOdg8BAkAQlLoHr_GSobHaPNJuBAAf_VQKAw4x81bXaz%2Fitems%2F01PVDBQA5QXJAYDP3OQVCIDUT3PR2Y4IV4%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..OFpoM24ycHBOMHdtcnlLUTBabEdhbDBJVWEyRFdydUpyUE5JU2tsNHlSbz0&cTag=%22c%3A%7B8141BAB0-6EBF-4485-81D2-7B7C758E22BC%7D%2C1%22&encodeFailures=1&width=1366&height=581&srcWidth=&srcHeight=)

Crear la base de datos en la cual se va a guardar los datos o si en caso que existe que utilice esa base de datos.

![This is an image](https://southcentralus1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fepnecuador-my.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!YP5u9sklC0iywPgRepMQVOdg8BAkAQlLoHr_GSobHaPNJuBAAf_VQKAw4x81bXaz%2Fitems%2F01PVDBQA36XDB4SINJNZHYQYVZEE5NHTTO%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..OFpoM24ycHBOMHdtcnlLUTBabEdhbDBJVWEyRFdydUpyUE5JU2tsNHlSbz0&cTag=%22c%3A%7BC9C3B87E-A921-4F6E-8862-B9213AD3CE6E%7D%2C1%22&encodeFailures=1&width=1366&height=581&srcWidth=&srcHeight=)

Realizar el track con el parametro que se desea extraer los datos que en este caso es Platzi.

![This is an image](https://southcentralus1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fepnecuador-my.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!YP5u9sklC0iywPgRepMQVOdg8BAkAQlLoHr_GSobHaPNJuBAAf_VQKAw4x81bXaz%2Fitems%2F01PVDBQAZQBGPDXYDXXRBLYZ442E3VPA62%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..OFpoM24ycHBOMHdtcnlLUTBabEdhbDBJVWEyRFdydUpyUE5JU2tsNHlSbz0&cTag=%22c%3A%7B3B9E0930-77E0-42BC-BC67-9CD1375783DA%7D%2C1%22&encodeFailures=1&width=1366&height=581&srcWidth=&srcHeight=)

Y finalmente comprobamos en la base de datos CouchDB.

#### Twitter a MongoDb

Para la recoleccion de datos de Twitter a MongoDb se lo realizo en jupyter notebook mediante script , por ello lo mas revelevante de tomar en consideracion es :

Importar las librerias necesarias, que en este caso fueron 4 , tweepy,json,requests y mongoclient.

![This is an image](https://southcentralus1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fepnecuador-my.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!YP5u9sklC0iywPgRepMQVOdg8BAkAQlLoHr_GSobHaPNJuBAAf_VQKAw4x81bXaz%2Fitems%2F01PVDBQA6KPKAN4RYZKNFJ5TUUJ7HKAS3M%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..OFpoM24ycHBOMHdtcnlLUTBabEdhbDBJVWEyRFdydUpyUE5JU2tsNHlSbz0&cTag=%22c%3A%7BDE807ACA-1947-4A53-9ECE-944FCEA04B6C%7D%2C1%22&encodeFailures=1&width=1366&height=581&srcWidth=&srcHeight=)

Tener las API es decir las claves.

![This is an image](https://southcentralus1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fepnecuador-my.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!YP5u9sklC0iywPgRepMQVOdg8BAkAQlLoHr_GSobHaPNJuBAAf_VQKAw4x81bXaz%2Fitems%2F01PVDBQA7FMPKVNDDISFAZI24IBGS4CRNX%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..OFpoM24ycHBOMHdtcnlLUTBabEdhbDBJVWEyRFdydUpyUE5JU2tsNHlSbz0&cTag=%22c%3A%7B56D563E5-688C-4191-946B-8809A5C145B7%7D%2C1%22&encodeFailures=1&width=1366&height=581&srcWidth=&srcHeight=)

Realizar bien la clase para la extraccion de datos.

![This is an image](https://southcentralus1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fepnecuador-my.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!YP5u9sklC0iywPgRepMQVOdg8BAkAQlLoHr_GSobHaPNJuBAAf_VQKAw4x81bXaz%2Fitems%2F01PVDBQA7ZUKRWWP46O5BYU2WNNBBZFP6Z%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..OFpoM24ycHBOMHdtcnlLUTBabEdhbDBJVWEyRFdydUpyUE5JU2tsNHlSbz0&cTag=%22c%3A%7B6BA3A2F9-9E3F-4377-8A6A-CD684392BFD9%7D%2C1%22&encodeFailures=1&width=1366&height=581&srcWidth=&srcHeight=)


Pasamos como parametro las claves para poder tener acceso.

![This is an image](https://southcentralus1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fepnecuador-my.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!YP5u9sklC0iywPgRepMQVOdg8BAkAQlLoHr_GSobHaPNJuBAAf_VQKAw4x81bXaz%2Fitems%2F01PVDBQAYTRJPEX5EKPVCLDW7UZMTSCV7X%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..OFpoM24ycHBOMHdtcnlLUTBabEdhbDBJVWEyRFdydUpyUE5JU2tsNHlSbz0&cTag=%22c%3A%7B4B5E8A13-8AF4-447D-B1DB-F4CB272157F7%7D%2C1%22&encodeFailures=1&width=1366&height=581&srcWidth=&srcHeight=)

Verificar que se realizo la conexion localmente con las bases de datos,colocar correctamente el localhost que tengamos.

![This is an image](https://southcentralus1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fepnecuador-my.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!YP5u9sklC0iywPgRepMQVOdg8BAkAQlLoHr_GSobHaPNJuBAAf_VQKAw4x81bXaz%2Fitems%2F01PVDBQAYH7ZWGSN3TCZBJ2ZFZPXF66OKL%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..OFpoM24ycHBOMHdtcnlLUTBabEdhbDBJVWEyRFdydUpyUE5JU2tsNHlSbz0&cTag=%22c%3A%7B696CFE07-7337-4216-9D64-B97DCBEF394B%7D%2C1%22&encodeFailures=1&width=1366&height=581&srcWidth=&srcHeight=)

![This is an image](https://southcentralus1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fepnecuador-my.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!YP5u9sklC0iywPgRepMQVOdg8BAkAQlLoHr_GSobHaPNJuBAAf_VQKAw4x81bXaz%2Fitems%2F01PVDBQA5FOQXZNI36QFDKRXCFVPGR5DFQ%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..OFpoM24ycHBOMHdtcnlLUTBabEdhbDBJVWEyRFdydUpyUE5JU2tsNHlSbz0&cTag=%22c%3A%7B962F74A5-7EA3-4681-A8DC-45ABCD1E8CB0%7D%2C1%22&encodeFailures=1&width=1366&height=581&srcWidth=&srcHeight=)

Realizar el track con el parametro que se desea extraer los datos

![This is an image](https://southcentralus1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fepnecuador-my.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!YP5u9sklC0iywPgRepMQVOdg8BAkAQlLoHr_GSobHaPNJuBAAf_VQKAw4x81bXaz%2Fitems%2F01PVDBQA5NAO72QKB4HBEKF6KFIL4O6NHC%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..OFpoM24ycHBOMHdtcnlLUTBabEdhbDBJVWEyRFdydUpyUE5JU2tsNHlSbz0&cTag=%22c%3A%7BA8BF03AD-3C28-4838-A2F9-4542F8EF34E2%7D%2C1%22&encodeFailures=1&width=1366&height=581&srcWidth=&srcHeight=)

Y finalmente comprobamos en la base de datos MongoDB.

## Importacion y expotacion de datos.

Se realizo la importacion de los datos obtenidos mediante los diferentes gestores de bases de datos CouchDB,MongoDb,MongoDBAtlas y Mysql.

### Envio de datos de Couch a MongoDb

### Envio de datos de MongoDb a Couch  

### Envio de datos de Couch a MongoDbAtlas

### Envio de datos de MongoDb a MySql

### Envio de datos de MySql  a MongoDb


### Envio de datos de MongoDbAtlas a Mysql.

### Envio de datos de Mysql a MongoDbAtlas.

Primero ingresamos nuestro Mysql.

![This is an image](https://southcentralus1-mediap.svc.ms/transform/thumbnail?provider=spo&inputFormat=png&cs=fFNQTw&docid=https%3A%2F%2Fepnecuador-my.sharepoint.com%3A443%2F_api%2Fv2.0%2Fdrives%2Fb!YP5u9sklC0iywPgRepMQVOdg8BAkAQlLoHr_GSobHaPNJuBAAf_VQKAw4x81bXaz%2Fitems%2F01PVDBQAYKTWZNZ7L5TRELMDJZR7UJMQBG%3Fversion%3DPublished&access_token=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJub25lIn0..OFpoM24ycHBOMHdtcnlLUTBabEdhbDBJVWEyRFdydUpyUE5JU2tsNHlSbz0&cTag=%22c%3A%7BDCB29D0A-7DFD-489C-B60D-398FE8964026%7D%2C1%22&encodeFailures=1&width=1366&height=581&srcWidth=&srcHeight=)

A continuacion verificamos que se encuentre la base que vamos a utilizar que en este caso es dbtwitter,ingresamos y procedmos a verificar que se encuentren los datos.
